name: @vue/babel-plugin-transform-vue-jsx

scripts.pretest:functional: yarn build:test && nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text-summary babel test/functional.js --plugins ./dist/plugin.testing.js --out-file test/functional-compiled.js
scripts.test: rm -rf coverage* && yarn test:snapshot && mv coverage coverage-snapshot && yarn test:functional && mv coverage coverage-functional
